title.rendered: Straighten your boat with Dometic trim tab system

content.rendered:
When transporting people, it can be easy that you can correct the boat. The boat can tilt if the weight is not distributed correctly. With a turn of the knob of Seastar’s Dometic Trim Tab system you can straighten the boat again. Do you also find this useful?

Watch the video here >>
